H0.text: Which Palestinian co-founded al Fatah in 1957. Yasser Arafat

H1.text: Which Palestinian co-founded al Fatah in 1957. Khalil al-Wazir

H2.text: Which Palestinian co-founded al Fatah in 1957. Salah Khalaf

H3.text: Which Palestinian co-founded al Fatah in 1957. Abu Amar

A4.text: After settling in Kuwait, Abu Iyad helped Arafat obtain a temporary job as a schoolteacher. As Arafat began to develop friendships with Palestinian refugees (some of whom he knew from his Cairo days), he and the others gradually founded the group that became known as Fatah.
